name: Five Nights at Poe's 2
description:
Can you survive 5 nights at your local pizza place with killer animatronics? Hide from the vile Poe + Friends before they kill you to follow company policy. 

How To: 

Press the bottom button to check cameras. 

Click the red button to put up the mask! But be careful, it's a heavy mask, so it will drain your energy!

Spacebar to turn on your flashlight. However It drains your power fast.

Open up cameras and look at CAM 04 often. If the red bar gets low, click the grey button!

Characters list:

Toy Poe

Toy Terry

Toy Stacy

Blastoz

Gmangle

Those are all the animatronics. Please do not expose them to fire or water. They will become even more deadly.

This game also has a custom night so you can make your own night with all the FNAP 2 animatronics and new ones.

What are you waiting for? Play now!!
